xt:extension.xt:author: Syncro Soft
xt:extension.xt:name: Render SVG with embedded BMP support

head.title: Properly render BMP images refereced in SVG images.

body.p: Oxygen XML Editor plugin which when installed will allow proper rendering for SVG images containing references to BMP images.
